name: Arms of the Astral Self
description: As a bonus action, you can spend 1 ki point to summon the arms of your astral self. Each creature of your choice that you can see within 10 feet must succeed on a Dexterity saving throw or take force damage equal to two rolls of your Martial Arts die. While the spectral arms are present, you can use your Wisdom modifier in place of your Strength modifier for Strength checks and saving throws, make unarmed strikes with the arms, have 5 feet greater reach for unarmed strikes, and the unarmed strikes use your Wisdom modifier for attack and damage rolls with force damage type.
